passives.name: Umbral Vise Extension
passives.desc:
Umbral Vise use +1

When using Umbral Vise:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ Slight Saboteur F boost
 â€¢ Self: 6 turns 1 level of Fang of Transgression (limit 5)
 â€¢ Grants 1 additional level of Fang of Transgression when attacking debuffed target
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack after use

While Saboteur F active:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Saboteur) ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets; high turn rate)
passives.short_desc: Umbral Vise Extension: Boost to Umbral Vise

passives.name: Buff Attack Speed
passives.desc: Moderately raises ATKã€? SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Attack Speed: Raises ATKã€? SPD

passives.name: Whirlwind Extension
passives.desc:
When using Whirlwind:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 3; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢  PG attack becomes group attack (non-targets' ease of Knock Back not affected by Break status)
 â€¢ Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 â€¢ Slight Commando F boost
 â€¢ Self: 6 turns 1 level of Fang of Transgression (limit 5)
 â€¢ Grants 1 additional level of Fang of Transgression when inflicting Break on target or attacking target afflicted with Break

While Commando F active:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Commando) ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage;  PG attack becomes group attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; [does not affect chained  PG attacks])
passives.short_desc: Whirlwind Extension: Boost to Whirlwind
